channel.title: How come everything i try and do it doesnt work?
channel.description:
whenever i code, the only time it works is if i am auto-spawning npc's. other then that everuuthing else i try, changing veng..adding shops... making a jail, doesnt work. plz help? anyone.
sincere - Sords

item.title: How come everything i try and do it doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @sordsman444 sordsman444
item.description:
@sordsman444 wrote:

oh i see, so i have to compile the server right after i edit it, but idk what JDK is. i must have an older version because it says that the jdk i have isnt updated or etcâ€¦ can someone plz give me the DL link?

im srry if im asking it here but im sorta new to mopar scape. =\

item.source: How come everything i try and do it doesnt work?

item.title: How come everything i try and do it doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

youknowho:

Post what your compilers says after you use it.

that or you have 100 errors
my first server had 100 errors and all i could do is what you can do

try setting you class paths
start > control panel > system > advanced > enviroment variables > new > variable name = CLASSPATH > variable value = CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

then that shoudl work
must have jdk6u4 or just change the varible value to which ever jdk you have

Read full topic

item.title: How come everything i try and do it doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @william1 william1
item.description:
@william1 wrote:

whenever you edit your files, compile it striaght after, if ti comes up with errors. fix it before running your server because there will be no changes that will appear up untill you compiler worked
